The hotel was clean, the employees were nice.  The room was very clean and fresh.  The location was close to the freeway, many places to eat or even buy snacks.  I would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: First off thank you for taking the time for writing a review! Providing first class hospitality is our first priority so we thank you for your positive feedback. We are happy to know that you were satisfied with your stay here a the Courtyard Buena Park after having the time that you had to experience during check in.

Summary: On a business trip to Anaheim and the Anaheim hotels were 100% higher per night this week. This hotel is less than 15 minutes from Anaheim and in an area packed with restaurants you can walk to. Clean and friendly, helpful service.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, thank you for your sincere feedback, we look forward to have you with us in the near future.

Summary Heading: Bug on pillow, trash in room, sheets and towels used - Don't go here
Summary: 1/3/18, we arrived for a two-night stay.  They did not have the suite we reserved.  When we got to room, there was trash everywhere, someone had left room keys on the table, the beds and towels had been used.  Worse of all, there was a large bug on one of the pillows.  We were given another room.  It was one bed and a sofa; we were supposed to have two beds.  I spent 48 minutes on the phone with customer service explaining.  They did not give us another room at another Marriott.  I refused to stay at this motel because of the bugs in bed.

Summary Heading: One night stay to do Knotts
Summary: This is a lovely quite hotel.  With super comfy beds and pillows and very friendly staff..Guys at reception very helpful with our muddled up booking. We would not hesitate to stay again .. very convenient to Knott's Berry Farm and shows.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to know that your stay with us was memorable. We look forward you in welcoming you back anytime!

Summary Heading: They will always do the opposite of what you ask for
Summary: I stayed at this hotel for a week. When I leave, while checking out, I explain the reception person that there's a package arriving for me that day, but that since  won't be in the hotel anymore, I would like them to please NOT receive the package. One hour later, from the airport I telephone them to ask for the same thing again, and they confirm me they won't receive it. That same afternoon I receive an email from UPS saying the package was delivered at the hotel. When I talk to the hotel they just say they don't know how it happened. TALK ABOUT SAFETY, RECEIVIING PACKAGES FOR PEOPLE WHO IS NOT STAYING AT A HOTEL. I tried to have them send me the package, but even though they assured me they were sending it that same day, they never did, and of course I never got the package. I
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide feedback.We offer no excuses for this mix-up and apologize for the inconvenience. We understand the frustration and truly hope you will offer us another opportunity to serve you. We are truly sorry that we did not live up to the standards that you expected from us. We have taken note of the issues you outlined and will be working with our team to improve these areas. Thank you again for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Great location, nice hotel and AWESOME staff.
Summary: I was here for six nights on a recent business trip.  Staff was very helpful.  Room was very clean and the bed very comfortable.  Breakfast each morning in The Bistro was really nice way to start my day without having to search for a place to eat.  The staff in The Bistro was where I had the most interaction.  Breakfast service staff was always very cheerful and helpful.  They are quick to get a hot breakfast in front of you.  The evening staff for happy hour and later evening were very friendly.  I ended most of my evenings with a  nice glass of wine and some conversation.  They guys were awesome, very funny and genuinely engaged in our conversations.  Thanks to the management team for running a well run property.  Having been in the hotel business for over 14 years,  I notice
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time and writing this great review. Making you happy makes us happy! We are glad that everything went great during your stay and that our team made for a memorable experience. Thanks especially for recognizing our all-star staff, as they truly love to deliver exceptional customer service to each and every guest. Ill make sure to pass done the compliments to the staff. We can't wait to welcome you back to Courtyard Buena Park!

Summary: Stayed here one night after a conference in order to visit Knott‚Äôs Berry Farm. Facility was well managed with friendly staff, updated rooms, and a pleasant courtyard pool area. It would be nice for a family stay. Restaurants and KBF all within easy walking.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time on writing a review. We appreciate the kind words and hope to see you back soon!

Summary: We stayed one night while planning a visit to Knotts. The hotel lobby was clean and inviting with a quick checkin process. Our room was a little bigger than what we expected (good thing) and when we called for blankets and pillows they arrived within 5 minutes. I wish they offered a breakfast like other chains as this could have saved us a few bucks. But they do have a Starbucks inside that offers up sandwiches and cereal and other things, a little pricy though.  As far as location goes, we walked over to the Pirates dinner show. It was just across the street, you do need to walk down to a cross walk as the street is very busy. We were going to walk to Knotts in the morning but decided after a long day at the park it was just a hair too far. If you have teens it would work just
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time for writing a review about your experience. We‚Äôre proud knowing that we have satisfied your needs. Our staff would be happy to welcome you back again soon on your next visit to the city of Buena Park.

Summary: 1)   The area is not walkable, since the street is very busy.  Also, most restaurants are either chains or fast food. 2)   The guy at the desk kept referring to me as 'dear' . 3)   Last, but not least,  the day I left , 4 bites appeared on my legs.   I am not prone to any type of mosquito bites, so I am thinking the worst.
Manager Response: Thank you taking the time to provide feedback on your experience.  So sorry you felt the area was very busy  the city of Buena Park has done a lot of improvements to make the streets  walkable. We apologize that your stays did not fulfill your Marriott standards.

Summary: suited me for 3 nights. Great location with bars and restaurants nearby within walking distance, although Shaun the "bistro guy" was very pleasant and an asset to the hotel. Rooms are standard CY and more than adequate. Would definitely stay again
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind response. We are happy you enjoyed your stay here at the hotel. I will share feedback with the team and look forward to welcoming you back again in the future.

Summary: Popped in for a quick overnight and met some clients for dinner nearby. If you're looking for a good location, plenty to do within walking distance, this would be your place. I found a cool breakfast place across the street, dinner options and entertainment within less than .2mi. The property is smaller which I appreciate. The room was clean and everything you would expect from a Marriott property. I say give it a go. Very good rates, friendly and helpful staff and even had a nice bar in the lobby area. I give it a thumbs up.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time and sharing you review with us. We are happy to know you had pleasant stay here with us. We look forward for your next visit back.

Summary: Nestled in between Adventure Endeavors and Delicious Eateries, lies the Hidden Treasure of Hospitality and Superb Customer Service! The whole Crew, of Selfless/ Genuine proud Marriott Workers, went Above and Beyond; to ensure that our trip was as Memorable as ever. Embodying what a True Marriott experience should be. Priceless, Moments of Extreme Hospitality.   Camilo!! The Captain runs a Tight Ship. Effortless attentive workers following his Lead of Excellent Quality and Service.Robert, the ever serving Doer Cynthia, the Front Desk Magician, serving up Courtesy with a Smile, and Sweetness. Anthony and Oscar in the Maintenance Area of Action and Professionalism.  They all team up to Provide a Service that is Represenative of Camilo and his Attention to the Customer!!  We will
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time in writing a great review about the hotel and the staff. We take pride on all the work we do and we are happy that we have satisfied your needs by staying here with us. I will make sure our staff is told all the wonderful comments. We look forward on your next visit!

Summary Heading: Noisy and In Need of an Update
Summary: I spent one uncomfortable night here located on the first floor.  I normally stay on the upper floors of any hotel but there was none available.  Either the occupant above me was a very heavy walker who paced all around his room or the ceiling is poorly insulated to deaden sound.  I think the latter as mid way through the night someone kept opening and shutting their door and that reverberated through my room.    Besides the noise the decor is not what I expected.  I guess only the lobby was renovated and the room may be on the to do list?  My room also had an electrical issue with the bathroom light going into a flickering mode for awhile and then shutting down.  The only saving grace for this stay was it is located right across the street from a Porto's bakery.  I enjoyed my
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time to write a review, we truly appreciate your feedback in hopes of improving our service and amenities. I sincerely apologize about the noise you were hearing above you on your stay. In regards to the electrical issue I will have our on property engineer to check all lights to resolve anymore more flickering lights. Once again thank you for your review.

Summary: Stayed here as we were accompanying our son who stayed at another hotel across the street (went with his school). The Courtyard was good and as expected of any Marriott hotels. It is clean and convenient.  Pros: - nice and clean - checkin was fast - parking was plenty (although at night you may have to park at the back side)  Cons: - when staying on the first floor, it does not feel safe to prop open the sliding doors to the patio at night as anybody can directly enter the room. Try to stay on the second floor.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback, we really appreciate it. I am happy to hear our front desk representative provided a fast and easy check in. In regards to the cons you have, we apologize for the feeling you had on not feeling safe. We will ensure the next time you come visit you will be able to put you on the 2nd floor if available.  Thank you again, and we hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Not Up to the Marriott Name
Summary: We stay in a lot of Marriott's and this was not what we are used to.  We arrived after 10pm on a Friday night and Cynthia checked us in and was awesome(she saved the place from a lower rating).  We like higher floors and this hotel only has two floors and we were put on the first floor right outside the noisy pool.  Kids were running around the hallways and people had their doors open and were yelling at each other.  We opened our door and had a fowl smell like a dirty dog and cigarettes combined.  It was so noisy we knew this wasn't going to work.  I walked back to the front desk to talk to Cynthia and asked for another room.  She said the hotel was going to be full but she would try to find us another room.  I asked for something on the second floor away from he pool.  She was
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent stay at the Courtyard Buena Park. I am sorry to hear about the issues you experienced during your stay in regards to the noise in the hallway and the smell. I am pleased that we were able to successfully relocate you to a quieter location on the 2nd floor.   Once again, thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: This is a comfy, well situated, great short stay hotel for business needs.  Close to restaurants and nice, clean rooms.  Like that there is a fridge and in-room coffee.  Staff are helpful and pleasant!  The hotel has a restaurant so was able to have breakfast option, but across street is wonderful Cuban cafe....nice to have choices.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great comments. We are happy you enjoyed your stay here with us at the Courtyard Buena Park. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: Everyone on the staff was fantastic.  Room and facilities were clean.  The mini restaurant and food machines satisfied any craving.  Highly recommended.  The front deck staff went out their way to assist.  Would definitely stay here again.

Summary Heading: Great Centrally Located Hotel in North Orange County
Summary: Great Location, clean rooms, nice facilities and great service.  Cynthia behind the front desk is a total Rockstar!!  You can walk to a number of decent restaurants and attractions including Knotts Berry Farms.

We weren't looking for anything that was too nice. We traveled in a group of 10 & had 2 rooms (joining rooms) with 2 double beds and a sofa couch (single). The place was ok - it served the purpose. Nothing good to say & nothing bad to say.

First off, think her name was Cindy,  tall blonde, no customer service what so ever, on several occasions of interaction.  Didn't know where my room was located, made me walk around the entire building, no assistance when lost luggage came, didn't even acknowledge me at counter and my luggage was behind the counter, I had to walk behind to get it, didn't offer to help in any way., no complimentary toothpaste or toothbrushes, and no toothpaste to purchase.  Sliding doors don't lock on first floor.  Couldn't wait to move to another hotel instead of staying for a month.  Not a great place to stay.  Very disappointing for a Marriott.  Went to another Marriott, they say they hear this often about this location.

Summary Heading: Our cozy, little home while in SoCal
Summary: This hotel was conveniently located in the middle of everything we wanted to see in SoCal.  The Medieval Times dinner show across the street was awesome (I also heard the Pirates show is really good).  There was an Outback Steakhouse right next door, and Denny's and IHOP were all 5 minutes away.  Had to compete for good parking near the side entrance.  The area is residential and quiet.  Do note that due to LA traffic, it can take an hour to get anywhere which should only be 20 minutes away.  We stayed in a 1 king bedroom suite with a sofa bed. Our daughter slept on the sofa bed and had her own TV in the living area. There was a small fridge and microwave, and the small vanity area, hanging closet and bathroom were attached to the living area.  The master bedroom had a comfy

I chose this hotel because it was within 3 miles of the hospital at which i had business.  I have traveled weekly for business for the last 3.5 years and i believe i have only done one hotel review and that  was very positive.  I don't usually express opinion unless it is extreme, either positive or negative (and even rarely in those cases).  To start, I am a platinum Marriott reward member who has never posted a negative complaint about Marriott before.  However, in this situation, the room was not clean.  I always felt that "cleanliness" was subjective and some people look for issues (white glove test) and that was never me. However, this room was not cleaned between clients (as in sheets not even changed-and i KNOW THIS) . In addition, I put the "do not disturb" sign on the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give our hotel feedback in regards to your recent stay at the Courtyard Buena Park.  We have shared your comments with the housekeeping manager and she will investigate this matter and speak directly to our housekeeping department to ensure that this was an isolated issue that is corrected moving forward.  Guest satisfaction is our top priority and we are saddened to hear we missed the mark on your stay, we do appreciate your feedback as it helps us to improve.

Summary: I stayed here multiple times for work during November - December of 2016. The hotel was a nice distance away from the hustle and bustle of Disney, but still plenty to do around the area. Good restaurants and clean rooms. I was happy with my stays here.

Summary Heading: stayed here as close to a business meeting
Summary: had requested a high floor room, facing the courtyard and as a platinum lifetime elite member, was disappointed that when I went to check in was given a ground floor room. hotel is in need of renovation and the carpets are tired and the room needed to be updated. it was very clean and the bathroom spotless.

Summary Heading: Charged a fee for something that I did not do
Summary: Take note when checking into this property- I was charged for some sort of burn mark on the telephone, that I absolutely know that I did not do. Better off staying somewhere else where the staff will not pass on charges unfairly!
Manager Response: Hello Kathy,  I want to start out by apologizing for the unfair charge.  We have reached out to you by email, to further resolve this issue.   Thank you for your feedback,

Summary: We stayed here for our weekend of fun at Knott's Berry Farm. The front desk clerk who checked us in on Friday 2-24-17 at around 10 pm, his name was Robert, was very helpful and had a very good attitude. He made checking in late a good experience. Every staff member we encountered was happy and helpful. The property was beautiful and clean. We will most definitely stay there in the future!!! Thank you for the great experience.

This  hotel  was centrally located  for our activities  for the weekend. The  room was clean and comfortable with a small refrigerator and  coffee  maker. The  staff were friendly and helpful during our visit.

This is the perfect hotel to stay in when visiting Disneyland and California Adventure parks. Close and comfortable. My whole family was happy. We will be back!!! Breakfast is fine, not fancy but it's fine. Staff was excellent. Gave us good advice on Disneyland tickets that saved us over $200. Thank you!!!

Rooms were a bit outdated and the front desk associate was a little awkward at check in. Nothing really made this hotel stand out but at the same time, nothing went wrong with the stay. The beds were comfy tho:)
Manager Response: Hello Stephanie  I want to start off by thanking you for taking the time to provide us with this feedback.  Although I am unsure of who checked you in, we have taken your feedback and passed it along to our font desk staff. We have taken the steps and worked with our associates so they can be more comfortable during the check in process.   Please feel free to reach out to me if you should need anything in the future. We do hope you choose to give us another chance in the future if your travels ever bring you back to the Buena Park area.  Thank you once again and have a great day,  Stephanie McDonald

Summary: It is given Courtyard hotels have no breakfast buffet included but our hotel room is nice and clean... CY Anaheim Buena Park gives the quick vacation resort vibe with its design. Out room was on the first floor with veranda in front of the pool area.

The hotel room was great, very clean and comfortable. Smelled very nice, and not moldy or old. Plenty of hot water, bathroom was roomy and the towels fluffy. The shower head was pressurized to the fullest, no slow drip. Our room faced the pool. Pool looked sparkly and refreshing. The location was amazing, easy access, and 10 minutes (walking distance) to Knottsberry Farm. Burger King is next door and a row of restaurants across the street. The free WiFi is fast, did I say it was free. The hotel itself was very quiet, my kids were the noisiest (sorry), and the beds made great trampolines. There is a Starbucks in the lobby and no free continental breakfast.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience! We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We take pride in the up keep of the hotel and we are pleased to hear that it was shown through your stay. The location of this hotel is wonderful and it is great that you took advantage of  it!   We hope you come back and visit soon!  Warm Regards, Alexandra  Event Specialist

Summary: Stayed here for a quick overnight but the facilities were clean. Centrally located to Knotts and other attractions if you are visiting those areas. Hotel offers free parking and wifi. The hotel rooms at the back of the hotel offer easy access to your room and vehicle.
Manager Response: Hello!  We are extremely pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and our location! The location of this hotel is great when you want to experience amusement parks and restaurants.   Thank you so much for staying with us, and we look forward to your next visit!  Warm Regards, Alexandra  Event Specialist

Summary Heading: Surprise! Not really; it's a Courtyard
Summary: The hallmark of the Courtyard brand is stability and consistency. Even so, we all have had experiences when a Courtyard is not quite up to snuff. The Courtyard Anaheim Buena Park is exactly what you'd expect. A clean, well maintained hotel convenient to California State Highway 91 and within a 3/4 mile walk of Knott's Berry Farm. The lobby is clean and modern. The rooms are a little older and the mattresses (I've now stayed here three times) are a little older and will be in need of replacement soon. The rooms feature flatscreen televisions with branded remotes allowing you to access the alternate HDMI and other AV inputs.
Manager Response: Hello,  We appreciate you taking the time out of your day to express your feedback about your stay with us.   We strive for success at the Buena Park Courtyard and I want to apologize for any inconvenience that you experienced during your stay. I want to ensure you that I have passed along this information about the mattresses to the appropriate team in hopes to get this issue resolved.   I want to thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you in the future.  Warm Regards, Camilo Bruce General Manager

Summary: I travel some 70 nights or more each year and spend a number of those nights in Courtyard. This hotel has a fantastic staff who does their best to ensure the best possible experience   The downside is the lack of focus to things such as being sure the fire pit works at night, having a quick meal available in the pantry and NO Diet Pepsi.  It seems the management is not staying on top of these things
Manager Response: Hello!  We are thrilled to hear you enjoy our staff. We do our best that we fulfill our guests needs in the best way possible.  However, we do apologize for the fire pit not being on, and the lack of market items. I assure you we will do our best to make sure this mistake does not happen again.   We hope you come back and see us again soon!  Warm Regards, Camilo Bruce General Manager

Summary: This was right across the street from the Pirate dinner. Staff was very friendly! Best we've ever had! Morning breakfast was a bit expensive for the entire family. It would be fine for a couple. Coffee was excellent.
Manager Response: Hello!   Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about your visit with us. We are so pleased to hear what a great experience you had , and that you took advantage of some of our local dinner shows. Our staff takes pride in customer service and we are proud that you experienced that during your stay.   We will pass your kind words on to our staff and we look forward to your next visit with us.   Warm Regards, Alexandra Impastato Event Specialist Buena Park Courtyard

Summary: I truly enjoyed my stay in this hotel ! The staff was really friendly, and the hotel is located in a nice area with lots of restaurants and shops around and even the theme park Knott Berry Farm is at a 10 minute walk. I will definitely come back !
Manager Response: Hello!  We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us! Our location is simply wonderful, we are close to a lot of the amusement parks and exceptional dinner shows and restaurants.  We are very pleased to hear that our staff was friendly and we will pass that message on to them! Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about your stay with us, and we look forward to see you at your next visit.  Warm Regards, Alexandra Impastato Event Specialist Buena Park Courtyard

Summary: We stayed here for a trip to Disneyland, so were only in the hotel to rest and sleep pretty much. The beds were comfortable and the room we were in was pretty quiet. The lobby is updated and the rooms were clean! The area around the hotel was pretty commercial-a lot of restaurants/theme parks, etc. I never felt unsafe returning late at night after a day in the parks. Overall our stay was pretty good!
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for taking the time to share you experience with your stay!  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and our location. We hope you took advantage of all the fun offerings of Buena Park and the Anaheim area.   We hope you come back and visit us again soon!  Warm Regards, Alexandra Event Specialist  Buena Park Courtyard

Summary Heading: Smokers must stop smoking in nonsmoking rooms
Summary: This is a good Marriott Courtyard.   The best thing about it is the location, which is walking distance to Knott's Berry Farm and an easy drive to Disneyland.  My one complaint is that the lodging is nonsmoking, yet someone clearly was smoking previously in my room.    I could mitigate the problem by keeping the room fan running.   But the problem is guests who break the rules and smoke in rooms.
Manager Response: Hello John A,  Thank you for taking the time to express your thoughts about your stay! We are thrilled that our location worked perfectly for your travel plans!   At the same token we want to extend a sincere apology for the smoking odor in the room. We pride ourselves on providing guests with an exceptional stay. We are sorry we fell short, however we look forward to seeing you whenever your travels bring you back to Buena Park.   Warm Regards, Alexandra Event Specialist

Summary: My recent stay at this hotel was below average. Granted this place is probably better suited to families going to Disney or Knotts Berry Farm but the place has seriously outdated rooms. The common spaces have been redone and are quite nice. The staff is also very nice. Not a good place for business travelers yet there aren't many options in this part of LA. Marriott really needs to update this brand.
Manager Response: Hello Mexner1,  Thank you for taking the time to express your thoughts about your stay with us! We sincerely apologize that your stay was below average. However, we are pleased to hear that you did enjoy the common space and our staff as we pride ourselves on excellent customer service.  We hope that in the future you come back to us and give our hotel a second chance!  Warm Regards, Alexandra Event Specialist

Summary Heading: Excellent Location, Good Size Room, Friendly Staff
Summary: We stayed here for one night to go to Medieval Times.  The location is unbeatable - It is literally across the street from the venue so we were able to park at the hotel (for free!) and walk over.  The rooms are good sized and have been updated.  We used the pool and spa also and were happy with the services.  Robert at the front desk was so friendly, fun, and welcoming.
Manager Response: Hello CAD3876,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your thoughts on your experience with us.  We are so thrilled to hear that you too full advantage of the hotel's location. Medieval Times is an exceptional dinner show! I will let Robert know how much you appreciated his service!  Thank you again, and we hope your travels brings you back to Buena Park soon!  Warm Regards, Alexandra Event Specialist

Summary: Spent 5 nights here.  Rooms are a little outdated, but clean fresh and comfortable.  Excellent staff.  Close to the Medevil show and Knotts Berry Farm if that's of interest.  I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello Jericog3,  Thank you for taking the time to express your thoughts about your stay with us. We are pleased to hear that you found the rooms fresh and comfortable, as a Marriott brand we do take pride on our cleanliness and excellent customer service. We are pleased to hear that it was shown during your stay.  We hope your travels brings you back to Buena Park soon!  Warm Regards, Alexandra Event Specialist

Summary: Rooms are fine, nothing fancy at all.  First room A/C did not work they then brought us keys to room a few down and then the keys did not work.  They did bring keys that did get us in the room.  Housekeeping was good and great location to the theme parks as well.
Manager Response: Hello Augie101898,  Thank you for taking the time to express your thoughts on the hotel!  We do apologize about the AC unit not working and the mishap with your keys. We are however, pleased to hear that the front desk personally brought the keys to you. Our location is excellent for theme park visits and we glad that you enjoyed the location!  We hope your travels brings you back to our hotel again!  Warm Regards, Alexandra Event Specialist

Summary: This is a pretty standard two-story Courtyard.  Unlike many Courtyards, this one is updated and very clean.  It is directly across the street from Medieval Times, and also just down the street from Knotts Berry Farm.  Obviously you can drive to Knotts, but if you feel like walking, it would only take about 30 minutes.  Also, Disneyland is less than a 15 minute drive.  Check in/out was very quick, although check out is unavailable from the room TV.  The hotel is perfect for families in both convenience and price. And free parking is included!
Manager Response: Hello Italiana58,  Thank you so much for talking the time to share your thoughts on your stay. We have the best location for explore the Buena Park and Anaheim area and we are very thrilled that you were able to explore those opportunities! We hope your travels bring you back to our hotel very soon.  Have a wonderful day!  Warm Regards, Alexandra Impastato Event Specialist Buena Park Courtyard by Marriott

Summary: We stayed here while visiting Disneyland, there is no shuttle or convenient bus system, but if you have a vehicle, and don't mind paying for Disney Parking, this is a good location at a good price.  Additionally, it is VERY close to Knott's Berry Farm.  The hotel was clean and the staff was courteous, we would definitely stay here again based on price and convenience.
Manager Response: Hello Patrick R,  Thank you for taking the time to express your thoughts about your stay with us. We are thrilled that you were able to take full advantage of the amusement parks in our area, our location is something that you just cannot beat.    We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and hope your travels brings you back to our Hotel soon!  Thank you,  Alexandra Event Specialist

Summary: Stayed 1 night with children to visit Medieval Times - right across the street.  Room was good with comfortable beds, there is a refrigerator and microwave in the room. Bathroom was small but clean. Lobby was one you might expect at higher end hotel - great for sipping beverages or grabbing a bite to eat.  Unfortunately, this Marriott does not offer free breakfast.  Overall, stay was comfortable and quiet. Will stay here again if in the area.
Manager Response: Hello Mario M,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your stay. We are delighted to hear that you were able to take advantage of the exciting offerings Buena Park has. Our cleanliness is extremely important to us and we are very pleased to hear you enjoyed our facilities.   Thank you so much for staying with us and we hope your travels brings you back to our Hotel soon.  Thank you, Alexandra  Event Specialist

Summary: Truly a very modern hotel.  Friendly, helpful staff.  Xlnt location.  Within walking distance of multiple breakfast, lunch and dinner options, Knott's Berry Farm, Medieval Times.  Room was clean, grounds well kept. Plenty of parking.  Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for your kind words about your stay with us! We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful experience. We hope your travels will bring you back soon!  Warm Regards, Alexandra Impastato

Summary: Stayed at this hotel while my boyfriend had training nearby. It was nice to be outside of LA itself because there was less traffic. It was close to shops, restaurants, and a few attractions too. Not too far from beaches either. The staff was fantastic. The rooms were clean and cold and modern. The first room we had when we checked in late at night had an issue with the bathroom sink but a quick call to the front desk and the manager on duty switched our room and met us with the key. The cleaning staff were all wonderfully friendly and professional as well.
Manager Response: Hello Leah E!   We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us! We take pride with providing excellent customer service and we are very pleased that it was shown during your stay. We are located in such a wonderful spot and we are thrilled to hear you took advantage of what we have to offer. We do apologize for the bathroom mishap in your first room but thankful to hear that our staff members were able to locate a new room for your stay.  Thank you for sharing your experience and we look forward to your next visit!   Warm Regards, Alexandra Impastato

Summary: This is a great hotel located in a good location Knot Berry Farm and Disney Land. There are many eating places and the hotel is right off the freeway. The hotel has a restaurant on site that you can purchase breakfast and dinner and they also have a bar.
Manager Response: Dear valued Guest,  Thank you for sharing these wonderful features about the hotel for future guests! We are delighted to hear that you were able to visit the amusement parks and take advantage of the surrounding businesses!  Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your visit in the future!  Warm Regards, Alexandra Impastato

Summary: I loved our experience here! We checked in late and was still able to get a high room facing the pool.  We received a letter under our door the following day saying how much the hotel valued us and even though we did not want our room cleaned, we can reach out to them for anything we need! Such a sweet gesture. We had a quick day trip to Disney and this location is only a 10 minute drive away.  Very quiet and safe.  Antonio or Andres checked us in and Bridgett was kind enough to send me my lost item from the hotel.  You two made our stay! Thank you for keeping the Courtyard brand alive and well.  We will absolutely be returning to your hotel for our next trip!!
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay! We truly appreciate the kind words of our hotel staff! We will pass along the message to them and make sure they are recognized. We cannot wait for your next visit with us!  Thank you,  Alexandra  Event Specialist

Summary: I want to thank all the staff for making our much needed break and mini vacation a beautifully well rested one. super comfy bed, hot water in the showers, pool is salted, my hair and skin thank you! and the whirlpool was an excellent treat after walking all day at Know Berry Farms. The food was great, the shrimp quesadilla is a must try.  Front Desk, Robert was a pleasure to speak with and very professional! The day before Christina was amazing, super thoughtful and great personality as well. The housekeepers and houseman who brought us extra towels and blankets YOU Totally ROCK!  I mean the rooms are beautiful, clean and very well keep, the parking is great, close to Knox Berry Farms and plenty of great places near by to eat that are family friendly. Please tell your General
Manager Response: Hello Sabrina! We are delighted to hear about your relaxing vacation with us! We are so glad you took the time to visit our amenities to help make you vacation even better! I will be sure to pass along your kind words to Robert and Christina, as I am sure both of them will be thrilled! We hope you come back and visit us soon!  Thank you!

Summary Heading: One night stay for graduation at CSU Fullerton
Summary: Updated lobby area - looks very modern.  Rooms are a good size, and in good condition. Not the Four Seasons but a nice clean hotel. Only has 2 stories so ask for a room on the 2nd floor and away from the street if you are looking for a quiet location. Very satisfied with my stay.
Manager Response: Pam, Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts! We are happy to hear you enjoyed our lobby area and our rooms. We hope your pointers will help out future travelers who stay with us. We hope you come back and visit us soon!

Summary: A bit pricey at 180 or about being that they don't serve a breakfast however they are located in the Knotts Berry Farm area and it is SoCal. Clean, good service, friendly staff, small vendor area offering snacks, personal items and a tiny Starbucks bar manned a few hours in the morning and a few hours at night.   Older property however well kept, nice grounds and sufficient pool. I was not at all unhappy with my stay.
Manager Response: Hello Tony S,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay with us!  We are so delighted to here that you enjoyed your stay with us, we certainly hope you come back soon!   Thank you!

Summary: I am a Marriott Associate and I have driven by this property many times, but never stayed here before (what a mistake, this property is awesome).  I can see the vision of the property, a classic motif with new age amenities.  I utilized mobile check in, but was required to have my card swiped, interesting.  The lack of free toothpaste and toothbrush was made up for the 1pm checkout and amazing indoor-ish whirlpool.  The room was awesome and everything worked perfectly.  I did enjoy how the Bistro attendant aided the FD associate when he was busy, great example of crosstraining.  This is a managed Marriott property and not a franchise (there is a big difference) and you could tell!  Everything was at or above par.  We stayed in room 241, which was close to the door and stairs.
Manager Response: Hello Scott!  We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed our stay, coming from a Marriott Associate it means a lot to us! We do take pride on guest service and we are thrilled that you saw that from the Bistro associate. We do however apologize about the mobile check in, we hope next time it will be a smoother process! We hope you come back to stay with us again soon!  Thank you!

Summary: Our family booked 2 rooms and stayed for 2 nights during our mini-vacation. Staff was professional, courteous, and friendly throughout our stay. Clean, well-kept rooms included comfortable beds and lots of pillows. Large lot with free parking. The hotel grounds were neat and quiet.We left happy and well cared for. Even our teenagers gave it a thumbs-up. This is our new favorite hotel!
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for taking the time to give your review!   We are very delighted to hear that you and your family had such a wonderful time with us. We take pride on keeping our hotel clean and well-kept and we are thrilled that our efforts were shown. We hope your travels brings you back and we cannot wait for your next stay with us.  Thank you

Summary: Thursday march 24th, we had a reservation for 2 nights, 2 queen beds, but ohh no!! They did not respect that ,and the no attitude night employee (10.30 pm aprox) he told us that only one king bed and a sofa thats all he can do for us!! Really? All that effort? He was like : welcome to the cheap corner motel! This is my limited  training and i can not do more for you guys!!!  We had to cancel.. Thank you for all the help? Tired and had to go back.HOME after a long day.. I  WILL NOT RECOMEND THIS NO ATTITUDE AND NO PROFESSIONAL EMPLOYEES HOTEL or MOTEL ?
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent visit to the Courtyard Buena Park.  I am so sorry that we were not able to accommodate your 2 bed room request, and that a King bed with sofa bed was not a comfortable alternative.  In regards the behavior of the front desk associates, I can assure you we train our associates to observe impeccable guest service and I am very disappointed to learn that was not the case with you.  Please accept our sincere apologies for these inconveniences that you had experienced. We take great pride in ensuring our guest‚Äôs satisfaction. Unfortunately, we did not meet your expectations.

Summary Heading: Great Service and Comfort Close to Disneyland
Summary: I had a trip to Disneyland planned and originally had a reservation at the Quality Inn across the street from the park. It was a very busy time due to a convention so even cheap motels were running way over $200 a night. A week before my trip the Q.I. called and said that they were having plumbing problems and couldn't accommodate us. I was frantic to find anything close to Disneyland around the same price that would be decent quality so I looked on the outskirts of Anaheim and found Courtyard Inn and Suites in Buena Park. It's seven miles away but it's on the main street close to the highway so it was very easy to get  back and forth to Disneyland. I would say a 15 minute drive. I have nothing but great things to say about the hotel:   -Service was excellent and staff was very
Manager Response: Hello and thank you so much for your wonderful review of the hotel!  We are so thrilled that your expectations were met regardless of the mishaps with the previous accommodations! We take pride on providing exceptional guest service and the cleanliness of our hotel and we could not be more pleased that it was shown during your stay.   We hope your travels brings you back here soon! We look forward to it!

Summary: Free parking, affordable rates and spacious rooms, though very outdated. Walking distance to Knotts. Very basic, but that's to be expected from Courtyard. Definitely recommended for people who plans to go to Knotts and the general area.
Manager Response: Hello!   Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We are pleased that you would recommend us to guests visiting the amusement parks in our area!  We hope you come back and visit us again!

Summary: I do think that the hotel needs to be remodeled.   The hallways and rooms seemed dark and dingy.  The carpets are worn and old, walls are the dreaded mustard color.  The front lobby gives a great impression, as it has been remodeled.  There are only 2 floors and it is in a big circle with an open courtyard in the middle.   I had an exterior room (233) and it had a balcony with sliding glass door that was plenty big to pull a chair out on.  The lower floors also had porches with sliding glass doors that are only steps from the parking.   I have been disappointed that Courtyard‚Äôs have discontinued offering any type of free breakfast for status members‚Äì even if it was one hot sandwich a day.  I was offered a starbucks coupon or water at check ‚Äì in; I always take the water.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, Storm0926!   We appreciate you telling our future guests a little bit about your experience and the Hotel. I apologize for the absence of water when you checked in, that was definitely out of the ordinary for us, and unacceptable.   Your feedback in regards to your dinner experience is very valuable, and much appreciated. Your feedback will be shared with the appropriate team member to assure this was an isolated issue and will not occur again.  Should your travels bring you back to the Buena Park area again, we hope you choose to stay with us again.  Thank you,  Michelle Ponte Operations Manager

Summary: A quick one night stay. Checkin was a breeze and the stay was great. Good prices with convenient parking. Sunday night front desk staff was very very helpful. Should have caught the gentleman's name ....
Manager Response: Steven H,  Thank you for your review! We are glad your stay was hassle free! We hope that your travels bring you back to our Hotel in the near future!

Summary Heading: Older but clean and comfortable Courtyard
Summary: I recently stayed one night the Courtyard Buena Park. I was there on business wanting to stay close to the Anaheim Convention Center.  This hotel is only about 5 miles away, which was great and much cheaper than the hotels right in Anaheim.  But for those looking to be near Knott's Berry Farm park, this hotel couldn't be better.  It's a couple of blocks away from the park and all off the other local attractions in Buena Park. Upon arrival, I would recommend checking in at the front desk before parking your car because if your room is towards the back of the hotel, it is better to park back there.  The parking lot was actually quite full when I arrived, but I found a spot in the back.  My check-in went fast and I was off to my king room on the second floor.  My room overlooked a
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write about your recent visit to our Hotel. We are very happy you enjoyed the comfort of the bed, and the powerful water pressure for your shower. We are working on how to improve our fitness center for our active guests like yourself, so please stay tuned :)  Thank you again, and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We searched for many months for a hotel for our Disneyland vacation.   It was a short one but I was really picky about what type of accommodations we would get but didn't want to pay too much.   We have stayed many times at Marriott Courtyards and have never been disappointed.     The gal at the front desk who checked us in was super nice.   When I told her my name she said, Oh we have been waiting for you.   We have adjoining rooms for you and your family.   I forgot that when I made the online reservation, I requested an adjoining room.    It was very nice that someone actually looked at the request and made it a point to make sure we got what we requested.     This hotel at Buena Park is right off the freeway and just 5-7 minutes from Disney by car.   I have spent many hotel

Stayed here for 4 nights while traveling for work. The room was a little small but well laid out and very clean, the bed was large and comfortable and the area around the hotel was quiet even with the construction 2 doors down. There are plenty of meal options near by (still requires a car) and I believe it was close to Knottsberry Farms.
Manager Response: Clean and Quiet is what we strive for!  Thank you for your review, Sarah C! We appreciate you letting fellow travelers know about your pleasant experience. We are only .5 miles away from Knotts Berry Farm, so hopefully when you're in the area again you get to experience the park while staying with us.

Summary: Checked in a few hours ago for a quick business trip.  Staff was friendly and welcoming.... Room in was clean and in excellent condition!  Bistro provides a comfortable atmosphere to wind down after work. First impression was a great impression.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are delighted with your comments about your recent visit to our hotel. Our main goal is to make your stay with us memorable. I will share your nice comments with all the hotel team members.  Thank you very much for taking the time to write about your experience at the Buena Park Courtyard.

Summary: We stayed 3 nights at the Courtyard. It is beautiful. Very well taken care of. It is clean and comfortable. The grounds are very well kept. The staff went out of it's way to be helpful. One member of the staff, Robert, was especially helpful. I want to thank him. The hotel is very close to Knott's Berry Farm and Disneyland. Compared to many hotels in the area I was pleased with the price. I would highly recommend.

We stayed here before but never used the amenities... It's lucky we never this because the doors would not open to the pool or spa... The whirlpool was cold.. The gym was ok... And the maids were really nice.. Won't be back.
Manager Response: Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to give us a rating on TripAdvisor. I sincerely apologize for the status of the amentities you wished to use while you were with us. We have reported this to our Engineer on property and made sure this was an isolated issue and will not occur again. We appreciate your valued feedback and hope to get the chance to serve you again soon.

Summary Heading: Excellent Stay At Courtyard Buena Park
Summary: The wife and I stayed at the Courtyard Marriott Buena Park for three nights and the hotel was excellent. The front desk employees were very attentive and helpful in all aspects of our stay. The hotel grounds inside and out were very well kept up. The room we had on the second floor was very clean,comfortable beds,nice little balcony,nice LG large screen T.V.,Wi-Fi was included,large bathroom and the room was very clean.We had no loud neighbors and we slept very well. We had no bad issues with this hotel at all. Plus we walked to Knott's Berry Farm which took only 10 minutes. There's also plenty of parking. Would stay here again if ever in Buena park.

Summary Heading: Decent functional hotel at a reasonable price.
Summary: Good value for a one or two night stay, I suspect their main customer base are business clients. Rooms are slightly on the small side but adequate and functional. Free of charge wifi, flat screen tv, refrigerator, desk area, sofa etc, I would have liked an in room safe but I am guessing this is not important to their average guests.

When it comes down to it, the bed is most important for me. AND this was the best. I even tried to find who makes the pillows so i can buy them. Plus great location, quiet, nice rooms, really nice front desk people. And great price.

I am a Marriott fan because of the exceptional service i receive and this experience was no different.  The counter staff, cleaning crew, management - everyone went above and beyond.  I usually travel for business so have fairly mundane needs, but when I travel with family there are always strange complications and your team takes the stress out of it all.  In particular, I needed directions to the beach one day and got helpful guidance along with my morning coffee.  We bought too many souvenirs and your from desk manager was kind enough to find a box for me to use for shipping. etc, etc, etc...  I cannot rant about your service enough.

Love this hotel!  The minute you walk into the lobby it is impressive.  Beautiful modern decor, very clean, spacious and the front desk gentlemen Robert was so kind.  Definitely stay here while visiting.  Knotts Berry Farm, Medieval Times, delicious Claim Jumper restaurant down the street....just to name a few.  Just can't go wrong!  Great stay!!!!!

Typical courtyard standard, all clean and well cared for. Almost next door to Knotts Berry Farm.  Has outdoor pool and gardens with rooms all around, spacious rooms.  All the palms trees on the site were being pruned when we were there how brave and hard working these guys are. Although on a busy road the rooms were quiet but great access to interstate Disney etc.Had plenty of fast food around plus an Outback Steak House right next door.

Summary Heading: Great hotel. Convenient for Knotts berry farm
Summary: We were visiting Knotts berry farm as part of our vacation. After researching the area this seemed to be the nicest option.  Check in was a pleasure. I must single out Robert. One of the nicest people We Have met on our travels. A real asset to the hotel and Marriott brand. Promote him!  The room was very nicely laid out, clean and tastefully decorated. Housekeeping was faultless.  One of the nicest features is the pool. It's in a garden/courtyard setting and was quiet and relaxing after a hectic day at the theme park.  Knotts berry farm is an easy walk away and there are numerous shops and restaurants in the area.  We only stayed for two nights so I can't comment on the restaurant but the lobby and lounge area certainly looked inviting. It looked recently remodelled.  I will

Summary Heading: Around the corner from Knox Berry Park
Summary: Nice hotel. Good Service. Starbucks, Full Bar, and Restaurant on-site. Quiet. Located in theme park central.   Check out the newly opened "Rock and Brews" restaurant next door. Great rock n roll themed restaurant with amazing drinks and food. I could there everyday. This is two building down and very walkable.   Lots of other great places for entertainment and eats in walking distance as well.

Everyone here was so nice. The food was good, especially the pizza! Loved being able to walk to Knott's Berry Farm. Short drive to Disneyland too. Great pool and courtyard area. I will definitely stay here again!

Nice hotel conveniently located down the street from Knotts. Close to the freeway and plenty of other attractions and restaurants. Arrived late and checked in fine. Room was standard hotel room. Everything was clean and no complaints.

I love this property.  It is very quiet.  The rooms are so beautiful. The bed is heavenly.  The staff are absolutely phenomenal.  They are so friendly, and very professional.  After only 1 visit, they recognize me and remember my name.  I'm so impressed.  The inner courtyard/pool area is so peaceful and lovely.    The only oddity about this property -- though not a big deal -- is that the elevators are not near the entrance and front desk.  They are actually halfway down each hall.    I would highly recommend this hotel.

Such a friendly group of people working at this hotel. Everything is very clean and comfortable, especially the beds. I travel for work and end up staying here for about a week at a time.  The bistro/lobby restaurant is perfect for breakfast and evenings for dinner (wifi, comfortable seating, good food, drinks).

A pleasant surprise for us.  In town for three nights, we took three rooms.  They were clean and comfortable and easily accessible from the parking lot so luggage was not an issue.  I was amazed at how quiet it was (even though they were completely booked up).  Never heard the neighbors or any traffic.  It was great. The room keys are a real hassle, between the two rooms we had to have the keys replaced a total of 8 times (it seems the lock itself demagnetizes the card).  Other than that all was well and i'd recommend this place for families.

Summary Heading: Nice property but a bit loud.
Summary: Enjoyed this property, it is a nice place and very convenient to Knotts Berry Farm.  Breakfast is not included, and the place is a bit loud (both traffic noise and just being able to hear every person that comes up and down the hall).  All in all, a very decent hotel with easy access to the freeway and everything in Orange County.

Summary Heading: Best hotel close to Knotts Berry Farm
Summary: Great hotel with friendly staff.  Very clean and quiet property, very close to amusement parks.  Cafe offered assortment of food and drinks and the pool and hot tub were very clean.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello dear guest,  We are thrilled to have hosted you during your travels to Buena Park. We are glad that you found our hotel comfortable and pleasant. It is our goal to ensure the satisfaction of every guest. We invite you back to our hotel whenever you are in the area!  Have a great day,  Rafael Ramos Operations Manager

Summary: Tired of LA traffic, I pulled over and pulled out the I Phone.   This place was the only one with a room.  Nailed it.  Glad I got it.    The room, spacious and clean.  the service, exceptional.  Didnt have to leave to grab some grub ( the chicken flatbread is great).   Since I was so close to that Knotts place, I was expecting lots of "kid noise" but alas....not a peep heard.  I normally try to scramble out of a room just to get out of a hotel the next day.   The set up is so good, I'm still sitting here typing this review.    Good Job Marriot

We had a major flight delay so when we showed up at the hotel they had given our room to someone else. They did apologize for this and tried to accomidate us the best they could we did stay an additional 3 nights in the room we had reserved the room was comfortable but the beds were very small they said they were queen but I would classify them as a full.( not big enough for two adults).
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your review of our property. We would like to apologize again for not having your room type available when you arrived at our hotel. Unforeseen circumstances do occur and we are glad to know that you found our team accomodating and able to assist you with your rooming needs. We apologize that your beds felt small. Here at our hotel we have rooms with two doubles and two queens. Regardless, I hope you were still able to enjoy your stay! We hope to see you again in the future.  Sincerely,  Rafael Ramos Operations Manager

Summary: We arrived late Saturday (5/30) night after a long flight. Check-in was a breeze, luggage carts were accessible, and there was plenty of parking. However, once we reached the 2nd floor it all went down hill. The hallway reeked of the smell of marijuana which children that were ahead of us in the hall commented and questioned what it was to their parents. And when we opened the door to our room we were ambushed by the smell of cigarette smoke, which I am allergic to. I immediately went to request another room, but I was told by Christina that there was nothing that could be done because the hotel was sold out. She did offer to find us another hotel. We declined because we were very tired. She also sent someone to spray the room with air freshener that did not really help the
Manager Response: Greetings dear guests,  Thank you very much for your review of our hotel. We are appalled to hear that your recent stay was far from satisfying. We are a non-smoking hotel and we expect all of our guests to comply with this regulation. Unfortunately during your stay here there was a person that ruined your experience. We can assure you that this is not the norm and if you ever stay with us again in the future, please notify us at the front desk of anything that is preventing you from enjoying your experience here and we will be sure to do everything in our power to make your stay more enjoyable. Thank you for your review as your feedback helps make our hotel a better place to stay. Have a great day.  Sincerely, Rafael Ramos

Summary Heading: Great Stay near Knotts Berry Farm
Summary: This Hotel was very nice and clean. All the employees including the cleaning staff were very friendly. Made the reservation at the last minute but still received a great price. This Hotel is within walking distance to Knotts Berry Farms. I highly recommend staying here.

Summary Heading: CLOGGED SINK 4 NIGHTS AND NASTY SMELL
Summary: Never recommend this place especially their managers who are very poor in customer service, they don't do required maintenance until guest ask for it! they sent mr. engineer who is very picky to touch the pipes so he just gave it a shot!!! next day problem still there so they sent mr. house man on site to make it worth and leaking dirt on the carpet which took for ever to get clean!!! at midnight the problem was there and they offered me on the fourth night to transfer to another room and i should be checking out in morning. just let you know that general manager mr. camilo bruce was too negative and he was offering me a breakfast!!! good luck everyone to experience  Courtyard Anaheim Buena Park. .
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for staying at the Courtyard by Marriott!  We would like to thank you for your candid feedback regarding your stay at our hotel and are dismayed to hear the issues you experienced at our hotel. We can assure you that this is not the way we do business, as our guest's satisfaction is our primary objective. We are looking deeply into the service issues you have experienced at our hotel this trip and will ensure that this is an isolated incident moving forward. We ask for the opportunity to be able to serve you again in the future to prove that our hotel is definitely the hotel of choice in the Buena Park area. If you need any assistance, please feel free to contact me at the hotel at 714.670.6600 extension 602.  We hope you have a great day.  Sincerely,  Rafael Ramos Operations Manager Buena Park Courtyard Marriott

Summary Heading: Good place to stay in anaheim
Summary: Nice place with lovel gardens and pool area, rooms as normal standard but not updated. There were some things that let it down, no in room safe, no make up mirror and mirror in bathroom was the only one which you could not get close to as it is above wash basin. Coffee was only 2 sachets and 2 paper cups and a very silly cheap and nasty machine, very mean for an overnight stay. Good vale for money but don't expect too much

We had a quick business event right down the street at Knott's and this was the perfect location to stay. The hotel was very well maintained and clean, the rooms were quiet and the staff very friendly. Would recommend this for families visiting the theme parks as well as business travelers. I only wish I had brought my swim suit, the pool looked inviting!
Manager Response: Dear Rachel,  Thank you very much for your comments on your stay with us at the Courtyard by Marriott Buena Park. We are thrilled that you enjoyed being a guest at our hotel as much as we enjoyed having you here. We hope that you choose our hotel again the next time your travels bring you back to our area. We hope to see you again soon!  Best regards,  Rafael Ramos Operations Manager

Summary Heading: Nice Courtyard within walking distance to Knott's Berry Farm
Summary: This Courtyard is slightly above average.  Although I only gave it an average rating due to the pillows on the beds and the fact that the only half the jets were working on the Jacuzzi.  Otherwise, nice fire pit area, nice courtyard. No shuttle to Knott's but a 10 minute walk isn't bad.  I wish I had known that you could get discount tickets to Knott's prior to my visit but that is OK.    The mobile check in worked great.  I wasn't expecting to be able to check in until the afternoon, but we got our room at 0930 and were able to walk down to Knott's for the day.  The front desk was clearly overworked Friday night.  But they did a great job handling all the requests while we were there.
Manager Response: Greetings dear guest,  Thank you for your candid feedback on your stay at our hotel. We are pleased that overall you enjoyed your stay at our facility and found our proximity to Knott's Berry Farm gratifying. I am going to follow up with our housekeeping manager regarding the pillows and the jets in the spa to ensure that on your next visit we can have you enjoy it even more. We hope to see you back in Buena Park soon!  Sincerely, Rafael Ramos Operations Manager

Summary: Excellent location and fairly good value. About a 10 minute walk to Knotts. The bed was very comfortable; the pillows were not.   My criticism is that we arrived at about 4:30 (check in time is 4:00 -- that seems pretty late), but our rooms were not ready. We booked two rooms over a month ago, so waiting nearly 30 minutes was not my favorite. Then around 5:00, only one room was ready. The staff tried to then put us on separate floors after we requested adjacent rooms. No thanks! Another 45 minutes on top of our first wait, we got the second room down the hall from the other.   But an overall nice facility. The kids enjoyed the pool and the whirlpool. The workout area is teeny tiny, but I'm not one to exercise on vacation.

My husband and I booked a reservation at the Pirates Adventure in Buena Park, for a quick getaway. The Courtyard Marriott was located directly across the street from both the Pirates Adventure and the Medieval Times.  The hotel lobby was clean and very welcoming. You first notice all the seating available for just relaxing and enjoying a meal and/or drink. The bar area has a Starbucks and a dining menu that covers your day, starting with breakfast. The menu does say "later" and I did test it by ordering a snack around 9:45pm. (I ordered Wings with a Thai sauce and Shrimp Potstickers - Wings were great, potstickers not at all). The shower is large and has good pressure. The Wi-Fi has good connection.

We had a nice room with a bal.  The bed was very comfortable and guest services were Excellent!! The hotel is close to shopping, food and major attractions.  I will stay here again when in the area. Best area for Disneyland.

I stayed at this hotel on two separate ocassions in December 2014.   Both times throughout my stay I was greeted by friendly and helpful staff.  On my second trip on route to the airport from Canada I realized I had left my credit card at home.  In a panic I called the hotel and relayed this information.  The young gentleman who took my call and assured me that things would be sorted out.     This young man took it upon himself to arrange to have the proper paperwork faxed to my work in order for me to check in.  Everything worked out smoothly and I am very grateful that this individual was quick minded so that check-in was no problem.   One night during my stay there was a problem with loud partiers next-door.   The front desk staff immediately and happily moved me to another

We took a daughter and grandson to Southern California for a little retreat. From check in to check out everyone was accommodating. We were early, but the staff took care of us and checked us in. The room was clean and comfortable. The facility had everything on premises that you needed. The staff went out of their way to take care of the "little things". We will stay here again the next time that we go to Southern California. The property is accessible to everywhere you would want to go in Southern California.

Summary Heading: Comfy with lovely pool but smokers in courtyard and loud location.
Summary: Excellent front desk staff, particularly Robert.  Nice clean rooms, and beds not as soggy as many Marriotts.  Location excellent from the perspective of proximity to freeways/Disneyland/public transport (460 bus to downtown L.A. at one end and Disneyland at the other!).    The fact that guests can smoke in the courtyard and that each room's air-conditioning draws from that courtyard is a problem.  Hopefully management see the light quickly and limit smokers to the carpark.  Once you open the door/windows to outside, there's plenty of freeway noise and the hotel is also under the flight path of a local airport, so there's lots of light aircraft going overhead - even some formation training and older aircraft, so expect noise from that too.  The only downer re location is that if

I was only staying overnight on business and it met my needs for that.  The bed was surprisingly quite comfortable.  I'm used to a Tempurpedic at home so that is saying a lot!  The room was basic, but had plenty of seating and a large TV.  The room had a small coffee maker with coffee pods of some kind.  I didn't use it as I was in too much of a hurry.  I had to turn off the fridge because the noise it was making was really unpleasant.  The toilet made a noise constantly as well.  The water pressure in the shower was quite good, which is a problem in some hotels.  Overall, I'd stay here again on business.  The biggest problem for me was that the outlets built into the headboard/reading light area on each side of the bed were not able to hold my cell phone charging cord/plug.
Manager Response: Greetings dear Guest,  We would like to thank you for taking the time to review your stay at our hotel! We are glad to hear that you slept quite comfortably in your guest room and enjoyed the amenities in the room. We apologize for the noise that the refrigerator and toilet made during your stay. We hope this is an isolated incident and are taking steps to remedy the situation immediately. We also apologize for the electrical outlets not working in the room. We will make sure our engineer is made aware of this so that we can ensure an even better stay when you choose to return to our hotel. Thank you again for your review and we hope you have a great day!  Rafael R Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed here for a couple of nights over President's weekend, and it was a mixed bag.  Hotel was very close to Knotts (though getting back on the highway was not easy due to a required U-turn and heavy traffic.  The room itself was OK, though it wasn't very clean upon check-in.  Bed was comfortable, but some of the power outlets in the room were broken.  All in all, we might explore other options next time we're in the area.
Manager Response: Greetings dear guest,  We would like to thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel, we really appreciate your feedback. I am going to share the comments about the room cleanliness with our housekeeping department to ensure this issue is corrected immediately. I am also going to notify our engineering department to ensure the outlets in this room all are in working order from the point forward. We are very sorry we fell short of your expectations this trip. I also wanted to thank you for your comments regarding our comfortable beds and our great proximity to Knott's Berry Farm. I hope that you will consider our property the next time your travels bring you back to the city of Buena Park.

Summary: I stayed here recently and the rooms were nice Clean room and. Well maintained property with easy freeway access. Staff were courteous, friendly and very helpful. A la carte breakfast was good and fair value.

Our stay was ok.. When we got there to check in there was noone at the desk. Finally after about 5 mins someone came. It smelt like smoke and there was hair in our tub. Only good thing about our stay here was the bed and it was quite at night so we got a good night's rest!

My wife and I stayed here for a quick weekend getaway to Anaheim to enjoy a Ducks game and Disneyland. I've stayed at a couple of other hotels in the area and wanted to try this one out. First, the location is good if you're planning on events other than just Disneyland. It's right off the 91 and close to the 5 so you can get around fairly easily (well, easy relative to normal LA traffic). There are many restaurants close by and there is a shopping plaza right down the street that makes it a quick trip to get anything you may need during your stay. The hotel rooms are pretty standard Courtyard rooms. I'm not particularly a fan of the Courtyard room design, but the room was clean and well kept. The staff was very friendly and helpful with questions about the area. I was a little

I stayed at the Courtyard this week and I had a very nice room. It was very clean and spacious. The staff was very pleasant. All in all a great stay! The hotel is located near some restaurants and though it is not a convenient area for walking, I would recommend the hotel to anyone in the area.

I was on a trip with my wife and we wanted to go to LA and be able to get some good times at Disney's parks. Due to the prices of closer to downtown hotels and how far we would be from Disney we decided to stay at this hotel.   The hotel looked pretty good on their website, especially with the pictures from the renovated lobby and things to do on its surroundings. Another thing that counted as a positive is that it was a Courtyard and we have stayed at some pretty good Courtyards before.  My disappointment started by the time we got to the hotel. Its surroundings were not as I had imagined and googled (through street view). There was almost no one walking around and the nicest thing around was Medieval Times. The next big disappointment was getting a room all the way on the back
