I am going to share the comments about the room odor with our maintenance department to ensure this issue is corrected immediately. It is a priority of us to provide you a smoking free environment and very sorry we fell short of your expectation. I also wanted to thank you for your comments in regards the perhaps dissaving geographic hotel location to the Los Angeles area.  I hope you next time your travels bring you to the greater Orange County area or the city of Buena Park you will consider our property. One more time, thank you for your candid comments.

Summary: Stayed here for a quick weekend trip down to the area.  Hotel is in a good location with easy access to lots of restaurant options.  Smooth check-in.  Room was clean and the beds pretty comfortable.  Free parking and access to an on-site coin laundry.  No complaints from me.

Stayed here during a trip to Disneyland (and yes super close to Knott's) as the other Marriott properties were a lot more plus their parking charges add up. It's your typical Courtyard, staff was friendly and room was comfortable, beds were good too. We found it a better alternative to the Fairfield Inn across from Disneyland as well as some of the other Marriott properties around the park. It's about 5 miles from Disneyland so you obviously have to use the Disney parking garage, but we found it worth it for a good night sleep at a reasonable price.  Oh we did run to a problem here, they were vacuuming down the hall near the lobby at 4 AM, we were half way down the hall and could hear it.  I called the front desk and they were quick to say they were vacuuming the lobby not the

Summary Heading: Solid Courtyard - Very Convenient if going to Knotts Berry Farm
Summary: We stayed here solely to go to Knotts Berry Farm.   The property is about 2 long blocks from the amusement park and is on the same side of the street which helps when you have younger kids, as there is a lot of traffic on Beach Blvd.  Check in was simple and easy.  We had a 2nd floor room (there are only 2 floors) which had a room with 2 double beds and then the living room which had a sofa bed.  The rooms are clean and comfortable.  There is a microwave and refrigerator in the room which is a big help.  There really isn't much to say about this property.  Free wifi.  Free parking.  Washer and dryer are available on the property (thank goodness!).  No complaints from me.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We appreciate your feedback about your stay at the Courtyard Marriott Buena Park. I am pleased you found our staff friendly and attentive as our commitment to provide a memorable experience with exceptional service, we hope to have an opportunity to better your experience with us whenever your travels bring you back to Buena Park.   Best regards,  Camilo.

Summary: I decided to stay here for one night.Hotel is in a good location, close to local attractions and Restaurants, Also I believe it was Robert that checked me in, great personality, makes you feel welcomed, thanks again

Not too much to say about this property, as it is pretty much your run of the mill Courtyard.   Check in was easy and gentleman at front desk was personable and nice to interact with.   The location works out great, as we walked to Knots Berry Farm. The walk is short and a few places to eat/drink to and from.   Lots of free parking available here and always appreciate the free internet connection.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, First of all, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience at the Buena Park Courtyard by Marriott. We are delighted to learn you have found our accommodations and service to your satisfaction. We take great pride in our service and welcome any feedback form our guests. Our goal is to exceed your expectation and to show you our commitment to guest service.  Best regards,  Camilo Bruce.

Summary: We went to Knott's Berry Farm for two days and needed a place to stay. it's nice that the hotel is only down the street cuz we checked in late and the guy at the front desk was very friendly and got us checked in very quickly. our room was clean. our bed was very comfortable.  i would recommend staying here!

We were visiting family for Thanksgiving,and needed a place to stay nearby.Maybe it was because I was exausted, but I slept good. This place was clean, quiet,  and comfortable, what more can you ask for, except maybe breakfast included?  We would stay again.

The price is right when you compare local options, and the Courtyard is friendly, clean, safe, and  conveniently located within walking distance of Knott's Berry Farm, Medieval Times, Pirates, Wax Museum and the fwy. Great hotel for families like us, coming down for Biola University events!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel with updated classy lobby!
Summary: My family (wife, daughter and friend) choose this location because of the close proximity to Knotts Berry Farm.  We stayed there 4 nights.  It was a short walk to Knotts and is located across the street from Medieval Times and Pirates.  Burger King and Outback next door as well!  We visited Huntington Beach as well which was about 12-15 miles away.  A very nice beach to visit. I took the kids to the Bodies exhibit (in the retired wax museum) which was very interesting and even kept the interest of two 11 year old girls (walking distance as well).     The rooms were fresh and clean.  The beds were comfy and the TV was HD (those are hit and miss).  The room had a sizable desk for your laptop.  My only gripe in the room was the bathroom.  It was small and difficult for both my wife
Manager Response: Dear Guest, First of all, thank you for taking the time to write such a great review about your experience at the Buena Park Courtyard by Marriott. We are delighted to learn you and your family had enjoyed our hotel and you found our staff friendly and attentive to your needs. We take great pride in our service and welcome any feedback form our guests. Our goal is to exceed your expectation and to show you our commitment to guest service.  Best regards,  Camilo Bruce. General Manager

Summary: Nice Hotel within walking distance of Knotts Berry Farm.  Unique feature: sliding glass door with an actual balcony.  Was surprised that our rate did not include a free breakfast.  So we walked next door to Burger King for breakfast.

We just finished 4 nights here and couldn't ask for a better stay.  The prices are excellent, the area is extremely convenient (30 minutes to LA, Santa Monica etc) and a very short walk to Knott's Berry Farm (which is fantastic).  Our room had a complimentary fridge! In a state where the temperature can get extremely high this was such an amazing small touch that made a real difference to our stay.  The bed was comfortable, the tv was big and had a whole load of channels including sports channels, the shower was powerful, parking was convenient, I could go on!  Honestly worth it, lovely friendly staff, easy check-in and check-out.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: Probably one of the best in Buena Park.
Summary: I don't think I have a single complain for this hotel besides the parking. It gets crowded on the weekends. Other than that, the room was clean. It was a enough space for two people. The bed was comfortable. Our balcony view was sort of blocked by a tree but no bid deal. We still got our fresh air.  It is located near the freeway. You couldn't hear traffic at all.

We stayed here on 9/6/2014.  The hotel is newly remodeled and our room with a comfortable king bed was very nice.  We didn't use the pool and outdoor seating area but they looked very inviting.  Staff at check in/out were friendly and efficient.   We arrived early (around 1pm) and were able to get our room right away.  The location is convenient to Knott's Berry Farm (just down the street) and just a couple of blocks from the freeway.

Our family stayed two nights here while we visited Medieval Times and Knott's Berry Farm. We had 5 adults and 2 kids ages 10 & 11 with us. We got two adjoining rooms with two queen beds in each room. The outside of the hotel isn't great, but once inside you'll see it's very clean and modern. There's a great little cafe in the lobby which serves Starbucks coffees and a pretty impressive breakfast, lunch, & dinner menu. We had a pizza here one night and took it back to our room. It was great! The outdoor pool was great and had cushioned lounge chairs as well. Our beds were comfortable and the rooms were clean. We walked across the street to enjoy our Medieval Times dinner show one night. It couldn't be closer. We also walked about 10 minutes down the street to Knott's Berry Farm

Clean, safe, comfortable and warm place to stay with family. Pool and Jacuzzi very nice and clean. New lobby also very nice. Close to many family attractions, restaurants and stores. I definitely recommend it!

Nice accommodating staff, clean rooms, working AC, clean towels, pool not too crowded and towels stocked. AC even in the hallways and working very well, greatly appreciated after being in the sun at Knotts Berry Farm. We were able to walk to and from the hotel with two young kids, it's about 2 long blocks, but flat and straight.   They were able to accommodate us early since we were moving from the dirty horrible hotel across the street. They even offered to store our refrig items if a room wasn't available when we got there, but they went above and beyond to get us in a room right away.  Definitely would recommend and very happy with service and cleanliness.  Thank you Marriott!

Summary Heading: Nice property and courtyard style pool
Summary: The bed was VERY comfortable and they white duvets/linens were great. However, I do wish they would have not put a plastic laminated sign on the bed pillow, for cleanliness sake. The room decor was updated and the business center had ample space, fast machines and complimentary printing capabilities. The lobby area has a nice cafe and is very modern in decor. The courtyard style pool area was serene with nice landscaping. We'd stay there again, without a doubt.

We went to Anaheim, CA for my daughter to attend the Vidcon convention. This place was not far away, in a great location, within walking distance to Knottsberry Farm, other entertainment, food, and shopping. Friendly, helpful staff. Loved the lobby tv and dining area. Computers, free wifi, and free parking, with a beautiful courtyard, easily accessible from our sliding glass patio door (we were on 1st floor). Would definitely stay again!

My wife and I stated here on our honeymoon to LA.   We exchanged a few emails with the operations manager of the hotel before we arrived and informed them it was our honeymoon. When we got to our suite they had left us a hamper and a beautiful personal letter to say congratulations. This was just the start of the excellent customer service we received throughout out two week stay. Every single staff member from manager to cleaning staff was polite and friendly and always said hello. Any requests such as to call a taxi were done straight away nothing was to much trouble.   We wanted to stay close enough to LA to visit everything but not right in the hustle and bustle of downtown and this location and hotel was perfect.   The facilities on site were excellent a nice outdoor

Summary Heading: Good Hotel For People Visiting Knott's Berry Farm!!!
Summary: It was a really close hotel to Knott's Berry Farm. The room was really clean and the hotel was a little old but the cleanliness was awesome. The only concern was that they didn't have free breakfast but that's okay because there's a Burger King across the street, we just walked to Burger King because it was close. The service was good and the beds were awesome. The upstairs room (which we had) also includes a balcony, and this hotel offers really big rooms. They also have a 24/7 market and Bistro downstairs. It is also across the street from Mediveal Times and Pirate's Dinner Adventrure.

Summary Heading: Perfect for Knott's Berry and anything else on Beach Boulevard.
Summary: This is your standard Courtyard by Marriott hotel. For those who are wondering, it is within easy walking distance to the Knott's parks(Berry Farm and Soak City). There are several eateries within walking distance as well. If you stay here, save your cash and walk.to Knott's.

The rooms were clean and spacious. I liked the fact that the bed was away from an adjoining room's walls (the bed was against the wall to the bathroom and had about a foot between the wall and the side of the bed). I loved the balcony and sat out there to read my book and drink my coffee in the morning!! The staff was friendly and helpful. I am allergic to down and they had my feather free request all set for us when we checked in. It is within walking distance to Knotts and a few minutes from Disneyland. When we return to go to Disneyland or do anything in the LA area I will definitely plan on staying here again.

Summary Heading: Great hotel and location and staff
Summary: I stayed here with my family during my recent family vacation. I requested a microwave and the staff was wonderful in putting one in our room before we got there.  The rooms are clean and spacious. The building is a little on the old side but they have done a fabulous job with remodeling and also keeping the hotel clean.

Summary Heading: Nice place across the street from medieval times
Summary: My wife and I are staying here tonight.  It's just as nice as the courtyard in Palm Springs, but is much closer to attractions and restaurants.  Wished they didn't do an automatic hold of $20 in my credit card but other courtyard by marriots seem to do the same.  The room is very comfy for a night and such a great base for things to do.  It'd be nice if they had a free breakfast but they don't.

Stayed at this hotel 4/30/14.  Not a terrible place but an older hotel.  The room has a governor on the air conditioning that holds it to 65 degrees at the lowest.  Let me say the temp in the room wasn't 65 or lower but the air cut off and I was still warm.  The room is old but well kept.    My boss and I make reservations for each other when we travel together under our name as it is easier than trying to do so for two different names. When we arrive we make sure each of us gets credit for Marriott Rewards Points.  This time my boss made the reservation and when I checked in the front desk clerk was a snot by saying I suppose you are going to take the points from him too.    That comment didn't make me warm and fuzzy.  She made me feel like she didn't put it under may name.

I apologized for the inconvenience you have experienced with the room air conditioner unit. I will follow up with the hotels maintenance department to ensure e this unit is fix. I am appalled to know you were not treated well by our front desk associate, it is completely unacceptable for any of our associates to be unfriendly and more so to make those types of remarks about your rewards points.  I will make sure we share your comments with all team members and use this as a reinforcement training opportunity. You have also indicated your dissatisfaction with our parking logistics. Our goal is to ensure you leave our hotel a 100% satisfied and based on your comments; we did not meet your expectations. I hope you give us a second chance in the near future to demonstrate to you our commitment to service excellence. Sincerely, Camilo

Summary: I was on back to back business trips and needed to find a low cost hotel in an area with things to do. This hotel worked out great. I needed to do laundry and I new a Courtyard would have one. This one did and they were able to put me in a room near it so I didn't have to lug laundry all across the hotel. Within walking distance is nice Starbucks. Knott's Berry Farm is just down the road and Disneyland a short drive away. It was a good weekend break from by business trip. Staff was great, room was great. On my list of return to hotels. Also they had plenty of free parking.

Summary Heading: Courtyard by Marriott - Anaheim Buena Park
Summary: Courtyard by Marriott - Anaheim Buena Park is a standard Courtyard.  It has nice rooms, free internet, a fridge in the room and has the same general layout as all of the Courtyards (e.g., two wings with three stories each and a center area with the guest services, common area, and the restaurant).  The room was clean and the beds were comfortable.  It‚Äôs down the road from Knotts Berry Farm so there were a lot of families with kids at this location.  I didn‚Äôt eat at this location so I can‚Äôt comment on the restaurant.  There are a lot of restaurants nearby to this location due to its proximity to Knotts Berry Farm.

Summary Heading: Nice place, very close to Knott's
Summary: Enjoyed our stay. Rooms were very clean, the beds were comfortable, the staff was very friendly and helpful. I will be happy to return if the opportunity presented itself.  The hot tip: ask for a first floor room facing the interior courtyard. These rooms have a walk out area to the court yard, with nice access to the pool area.

I've stayed at many Marriott Courtyard hotels in the past, and usually they are pretty decent ....but this was not up to Marriott standards at all.  The room seemed clean, but the bathroom sink smelled!  At first I thought it would go away or needed cleaning, but every day the same sewer like odor was there, I had to use the water in the bath tub as I couldn't stand running the water to even brush my teeth or wash my face!  I went to the front desk to discuss the issue, and I was ignored.  The front desk person was staring at his computer screen, never acknowledged my presence  until another front desk staff member told him to help me out.  By that time I decided to cut my stay short and checked out early.  Worst stay ever and I'll continue to frequent the Marriott chain in

Summary: Stayed here for two nights. I was pleasantly surprised that it was quiet, since it's close to Knotts and the freeway. The room was clean and comfortable. I enjoyed the inviting courtyard and lobby. The staff was friendly and helpful. I would stay here again.

I have stayed here several. Ask to stay in the back as it can get noisy from people walking by. Last stay was in a 1 bed suite and appeared to be newly renovated. Only complaint is the beds arevso hard I had to sleep on the couch. Tried using the sofa bed as a pull out bed but the matress is about and inch thick and you can feel the bars. Did not make for a good nights sleep.

My husband and I were lucky enough to get 2 extra nights away after a business trip so we decided to spend Valentine's Day at Disneyland. AS you could imagine all of the hotels near by were very expensive around that time. I found a deal on Groupon for 2 night, $195 total with a $8 kick back.   I was totally happy with the whole stay. The staff was excellent, friendly and helpful. The room was super clean, easy to access with lots of parking. We asked for a 2nd floor room, there is an elevator so you do not have to drag bags up stairs. Also the room has a balcony, which is nice to open and enjoy some fresh air. The room lay out was great with plenty of room. The bed was comfy, way better than the last 2 beds we slept in on the business part of our trip. One was at a Marriott in

Summary Heading: Great Hotel the and close to Knotts Berry Farm
Summary: Came with friends to stay here and was surprised by how great this hotel is. The rooms are very nice and clean. The value of the hotel is very good considering how much the hotel has like a big pool and jacuzzi and the free shuttle to the park. Also many good restaurants nearby like the Claim Jumper. The staff was friendly and quick to check me and my friends in. I recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Knotts Berry Farm or just the Buena Park area in general. Will stay here again when I visit again.

We were looking for a room just for one night as we were going to fly out of LA.  We wanted to find something fun and simple to do for fun so we booked tickets to Medeival times which is across the street from this hotel.  We chose this hotel because of its easy location to Medieval Times.  It was truly just across the street which was convenient.  The area felt safe enough and clean.  It is also located near Knottsberry Farm.  The problem was the beds were extremely uncomfortable.  There were also some very annoying flashing lights inside the room that made it hard to sleep.  One was the smoke detector which seemed to flash VERY brightly all night long.  There was also a flashing light that flashed up the wall behind the television.  It made it very hard to sleep. Summary: My husband and I stayed here when we went to Medieval Times for his birthday, also with our son who was just 4 months old at the time. Perfect location, very clean, very updated and lots of amenities! Loved the king bed and spacious room! We already booked our next trip just for the two of us this time :)  A night at Medieval Times again, but for Valentine's Day!!
Manager Response: Greetings, Thank you for choosing the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Buena Park during your recent visit to the Buena Park area. We are very pleased to hear that you found our hotel to be ideal for Young Families and were able to visit Medieval Times Dinner Tournament across the street from our hotel. I appreciate the fact you have acknowledge the cleanliness of our hotel, a clean and safe environment is one of our number one priorities.  I am very glad you are making plans to visit us again for Valentine‚Äôs Day.  Please do not hesitate to contact us if you should have any questions or need any other recommendation of places to visit or general activities within the city Thank you again for your comment, Sincerely, Camilo Bruce ‚Äì General Manager

Summary: This is a long overdue review since we stayed here last May.  Our family is becoming a big fan of Courtyard by Marriott and this hotel in Buena Park is one of the best we have stayed in.  It is in a very convenient, perfect location (restaurants abound in the area).  Although our trip to SoCal was to visit Universal Studios, we chose to stay in the Buena Park after a friend highly recommended this hotel and we were not disappointed.  My first gauge of a good stay is usually the welcome we get once we arrived after a long drive from San Francisco.  The front desk personnel didn't disappoint and was very  helpful and welcoming.  (Now I regret writing this review too late because I ca no longer remember the name of the young man who helped us check-in.)  The room was clean and beds

The hotel itself is beyond reach to everything. Night shows, Knotts berry farm, just minutes ride to disneyland . Convenient for a bus ride, coz the hotel is just few steps to the bus stop stand.  Check-in was quick with friendly staff. My only complaint is the morning restaurant attendant. She doesn't care enough to guide you what to order for breakfast. I know you have everything listed but i would have been happy to know what and what"s not included in each menu. NOT by just standing and glaring, waiting for the order to be said.   Not friendly, not accommodating, not a good customer service person. Oh well, if this is what to expect  of not having a breakfast included in my reservation, oh well i got it right into my face. November 26 @ 9am to be exact. the food is good tho'

This Courtyard by Marriott is great.  Eveyone is very nice and helpful.  The hotel is super clean.  The hotel has a Cafe Bistro where you can grab breakfast.  Everything was great. Would stay there again for sure. This hotel is within walking distance to Knotts Berry Farm and resturants.

We spent three nights at this location in June 2013 for a family reunion and disneyland. Our room had two queen beds and was located on the first floor facing the courtyard and pool area and with the sliding door my kids had easy access to the pool without having to go through the hotel lobby. Room and bathroom were very clean. Beds and foam pillows were very comfy. Microwave and fridge worked properly and we're very clean as well. Free parking and wifi too. Only complaint is check in...long line and only one register open with quite a few employees just standing around behind counter. Despite the check in slowness will definitely add to my list of places to stay in Orange County.

Stayed for the week, all was great. Staff was up to date with local food and dining, very helpful. Second floor room facing the pool was nice, large balcony and able to leave the outside door open for fresh air. The pool was spotless and the landscaping was very nice. Clean and green.  Breakfast was quick and hot with Starbucks on site. Will definitely stay on all business trips.

Having stayed more nights in a hotel than in my own home the past two years, I can say that this group is the most dedicated and caring toward their guests than I have experienced staying at all levels of Marriott Properties.  From always having my favorite beverage, to making last minute arrangements (cancelling and booking)- they go well beyond what is expected, and truly aim to delight the guest.  Always addressing you by name, and truly feeling like a part of a family is the outcome of this well trained staff.  My hats off to the entire team for making life on the road just a bit more livable.
Manager Response: Greetings,  Thank you for your recent stay at the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Buena Park; also, thank you for your kind words regarding our staff.    At Courtyard, we understand that traveling day in and day out can be daunting and we truly aim to make all of our guests feel like they are at their home away from home.  Thank you again for taking he time to provide such genuine feedback and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Regards,  Camilo Bruce ‚Äì General Manager

Summary: It was a great deal for being so close to Knott's Berry Farm - it was like most Courtyards you know what to expect, on the older side not a brand new one but still clean and good service.  First room smelled like cigarette smoke due to the air conditioning pulling in smoke from a lower balcony, and they quickly fixed the issue.
Manager Response: Greetings,  Thank you for your recent stay at the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Buena Park.  It is good to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and that you found the hotel to be ideally located to Knott‚Äôs Berry Farm.  Even though you had some challenges with your original room, I am glad that our staff was able to resolve the issue in a timely manner.  Thank you again for your recent visit with us; we hope you will think of the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Buena Park for your next trip.  Sincerely,  Camilo Bruce ‚Äì General Manger

Summary: Friendly staff, free parking, close to everything we needed to go. Walking distance to various chain restaurants and Knotts Berry Farm, we have not had the chance to enjoy...   It was fast check in. The price for the room was reasonable. The staff placed us on the 1st floor close to the pool. We first worried about potential noise coming from the pool, but it was not as disturbing as we thought.  The package included the Wi-Fi Internet, so I was able to stay in touch with my overloaded work as usual. Highly recommended to those staying in Buena Park needing easy access to everything.
Manager Response: Greetings,  Thank you for selecting the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Buena Park during your recent trip to the Orange County area.  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the property and found it ideally located to all Los Angeles and Orange County has to offer.  We truly appreciate your business and hope you think of the Courtyard when planning your next visit.  Sincerely,  Camilo Bruce ‚Äì General Manager

Summary: I have to admit I finally had a great experience at a Courtyard. I stay primarily at Marriott brand hotels and while Fairfield Inns and Flagship Marriotts have consistently been great, every stay at a Courtyard has been a disappointment.  That has all changed now. The front desk staff both at arrival at night and departure in the morning were fantastic. Very professional and nice. While I was on business, the location is perfect for families vacationing and going to Knotts or Disneyland. I may have found my new favorite hotel in Buena Park.
Manager Response: Greetings,  Thank you for staying at the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Buena Park.  I am glad you enjoyed your stay with us and it is wonderful to hear that our property was able to change your perception of Courtyard as a brand.    Thank you again for your business and we hope you think of the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Buena Park the next time you are in the Orange County area.  Sincerely,  Camilo Bruce ‚Äì General Manger

Summary: We had a very nice stay here for 2 nights. The staff is great and love the rooms very comfortable. And the pool is great and the location is perfect. Plenty of close resturants. The only negatives are very small ice machine is way on the other side of the hotel. And not a big fan of the bristo.

Summary Heading: SUPER CLOSE to KNOTTS BERRY FARM & CLEAN
Summary: We stayed for one night while headed back from our week long vacation in Palm Springs we took the kids to Knotts. It was fast check in. Super close, clean and was very good priced! Would definitely stay again! Not to mention spacious enough for a family of five ;)

Great bed,  Great Room, Unique Breakfast Options. Don't get a ground floor room loud thumping over our heads at night.Indoor Whirlpool  a nice bonus but full of kids. I like the decor and the upgrades.When we checked in our TV was not working called the front desk maintenance guy was in my room in 5mins and fixed it quick.  If you want safe comfy beds and nice decor Marriott is a great choice walking distance to KBF

We stayed here July 18, 2013 for 2 nights. The staff was excellent. They went out of their way to accommodate us. My daughter and son-in-law were staying elsewhere and needed to store a 14 foot Kayak for the day and the manager went out of his way to find a place it could be stored safely while we were at Knotts Berry Farm.  The park is less than ¬Ω a mile to walk.    The food at the hotel was excellent. We had both the Pizza and Quesadilla‚Äôs. They have a full bar. Plus there is a Starbuck's inside the hotel and one next door. There is a nice pool and the rooms were very clean and comfortable.  They had 2 computers in the lobby for anyone to use. Plus a printer so you could print your boarding pass if needed. TV‚Äôs at the tables in the bar/lobby area. It was very nice. We just

We wanted to find a nice hotel near the Disney parks for our vacation, to avoid the traffic jams in LA. As I had previously stayed a few times in other Marriott properties, I've chosen this hotel to spend a week. It's located near I-5, that takes to the Disneyland resort. It's also very close to Knott's Berry Farm.  The hotel has a friendly staff, the rooms are very clean and there's free parking and free wi-fi connection. There's also a swimming pool, but we didn't use it. No noise from the street or from the pool after it closes. We had no issues with late parties by the pool.  Highly recommended for families visiting Disney Resort and other attractions in Anaheim area.

The lobby has been remodeled and gives you the impression that the hotel is remodeled.  The rooms have popcorn ceilings and there are asbestos warning signs through out the hotel.  The location is amazing.  You can walk to knotts berry farm.  We also drove to Disneyland from the hotel.   The shower water is hot.  Their is a snack shop in the lobby along side the bistro.  We were able to grab quick snacks.  If you come back late at night, anticipate on parking at the back of the hotel.  Target is right down the street along with Walgreens if you forget to pack something.  We stayed here two nights and were satisfied.  My daughter ended up getting a fever and the front desk allowed for a late check out, that was above and beyond our expectations.

Summary Heading: Comfortable, affordable hotel within walking distance to Knotts Berry Farm
Summary: We stayed here for two nights while visiting Knotts Berry Farm.  I was traveling with two teenagers, and we found the room to be very comfortable.  We really like that we could easily walk to Knotts Berry Farm, just a few blocks away.  We even came back to the hotel part way through our day to take a rest before heading back in the evening. The neighborhood feels a bit sketchy, lots of homeless. But it is also a very busy street, so we did not feel unsafe.  I don't think I'd walk it by myself really late at night, though. This hotel has a large outdoor swimming pool, which we did not use.  It was always crowded.  It has a large indoor hot tub, which we shared with some other guests on our first night. Since it can often get cool and foggy in the evening in California, the hot

The hotel was clean, updated and comfortable! The customer service was excellent! I enjoyed the lobby area and bar . The only issue was parking at night. Very hard to find a good spot. I had a two year old and had to walk pretty far alone at night to get to room.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Buena Park during your recent visit to the area, and thank you for your feedback.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed the improvements that have recently been made to our hotel.  As mentioned, finding the ideal parking spot at any venue can sometimes be a challenge.  Should you find yourself staying with us in the future, please feel free to ring the front desk and ask for assistance; we will gladly send someone to the parking lot to escort you back to your room.  Thank you again for choosing Marriott and thank you for your comments ‚Äì we hope to see you again soon.  Camilo Bruce ‚Äì General Manager

Summary: We stayed there two nights. We went to Knotts Berry Farm and to Newport Beach.  The rooms were very nice and clean. Had great security, you can't take the elevator unless you have a room key.  The staff was very nice and helpful. I forgot a few items in my room last week  and they said they would box them and mail to me.  They offer free Wi-Fi, and a nice business center.  I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Buena Park Courtyard during your recent visit to Orange County.  We are glad to hear that you found our location ideal for visiting various local attractions.  We are also delighted to hear that you were pleased with the property and service.  Again, thank you for choosing Courtyard and we look forward to your next stay.  Camilo Bruce ‚Äì General Manager

Summary: We stayed here one night after our visit to Knotts Berry Farm. The rooms were clean and quiet. The pool was a big hit with my daughter. The service was outstanding. The cafe had great food choices for all of us. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for selecting the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Buena Park.  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you had the opportunity to experience some of our many amenities.  Thank you again for choosing Marriott; we look forward to your next stay.  Camilo Bruce ‚Äì General Manager

Summary: A friend and i planned a 4th of july trip together with our families,, check in was quick , staff was very friendly, helpful. The hotel appearance is very nice, they offer lots of ammenities. The pool is clean the whirlpool was indoor which made it more private. We were in a suite that was on the 1st floor, its sliding doors opened up to the pool which worked out great since we had children and made it easier to go back and forth to the pool.Our suite was spacious and clean , had a separate living room and sleeping room, the living room also had a sofa pullout that slept another person, it also had coffee maker, refrigerator, microwave, flat screen TVs. Its also walking distance to Knotts Berry Farm which saved us $15 on parking. Would definately recommend this hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for selecting the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Buena Park during your 4th of July getaway, and thank you for you review.    We are delighted to hear that you and your family enjoyed your visit with us and had the opportunity to soak up the warm California sun at our pool.  We are also happy to hear that you enjoyed one of our newly renovated suites during your trip; designed especially for families.  Thank you again for your comments and we look forward to seeing you and your family again soon.  Camilo Bruce ‚Äì General Manager

Summary: Free wifi, fluffly pillows (5 or 6), spacious, mini fridge, easy access parking, had a pool and fitness center but we didn't use them.  Room was very clean, had door cards.  Staff was friendly, breakfast would have been an extra charge.  What you have come to expect from a Marriott - no issues.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for choosing Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Buena Park during your recent trip to the Orange County area.  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope you choose to stay with us again in the future.  Thank you again for choosing Marriott and we look forward to your next stay.  Camilo Bruce ‚Äì General Manager

Summary: very new hotel and it shows. Clean rooms, hallways, and lobby, friendly staff, and a nice swimming pool with palm trees in the center. Located in a clean neighborhood, ample parking. The hotel is just two floors, just saying.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Buena Park and thank you for your feedback.  We are delighted to hear that you are enjoying the recent upgrades to our hotel and hope you choose the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Buena Park the next time you are in the area.  Camilo Bruce ‚Äì General Manager

Summary Heading: NIce Hotel, friendly staff, good location
Summary: I only don't give this a five star because of the lack of free breakfast, and the obviously pool-related musty chlorine odor that was present throughout the hallways and rooms, but do no be alarmed, it was a very nice hotel! I really would recommend it to anyone staying in the Buena Park area.    We arrived near midnight for check in due to the drive from the bay area during commute hours, but the front desk staff was still very nice.  We got our room assigned, but realized it was at the end of the hallway next to the ice machine.  My husband and I seem to have a running gag where we always get stuck next to a loud ice machine that will wake us up all night in almost every hotel we have been to.  I called the front desk from our room and he quickly fixed the situation and moved

If you find yourself staying at our hotel again, keep your eyes peeled for our rates that include breakfast ‚Äì they are slightly higher, but well worth it in the long run.  Thank you again for sharing your experience with us and we look forward to your next visit.  Camilo Bruce ‚Äì General Manger

Summary Heading: Very clean and comfortable and convenient
Summary: I enjoyed our stay here, it was very clean and comfortable and right across the street from our venue.  The room was neat and clean and an extremely comfortable bed with a lot of pillows (my favorite).  The staff were very friendly and helpful.  They have a small snack shop with a nice variety, but the prices are very steep and I feel should be lowered.  (A 12oz Mikes Lemonade cost $6.75)   This is the only reason for the 4 rating rather than 5.  I did not use the Bistro, but it looked very clean and comfortable.  We did use the pool, it was clean and relaxing but it is small, would like to see larger towels offered.  Whirlpool is nice too.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Buena Park during your recent visit to Southern California, and thank you for your feedback.  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and hope you look to us in the future, should you find yourself traveling to the area in the again.  Thank you again for choosing Marriott and we look forward to your next stay.  Camilo Bruce ‚Äì General Manager

Summary: We have stayed at many great Courtyard Marriott's throughout the country.  This property looked good on paper, and it's location was ideal. close to Knott's Berry Farm, our destination.  The beds were comfortable, and our room was large and quiet.  The downside was the room had a very strong oder, as if the maids tried to cover up a smoking room smell. It was truly kind of nauseating. The worst offense at this hotel was the "restaurant", the Bistro.  We had dinner and breakfast there and the food was horrid. Most of all the dishes we ordered tasted strange as if they were frozen, then microwaved. Yuck.  The staff was the best thing about the hotel, very helpful and professional.  However, we will not be staying here again.  Oh, and they make a big deal about serving Starbucks

Connect.  Your comments came as a surprise to us, as we do not have microwaves in our kitchen.  In the future, please let our staff know that you are dissatisfied, and they will be happy to replace your entr√©e.  Thank you again for choosing Marriott; and thank you for all of your terrific feedback.  Comments like yours help us improve our hotel and the overall guest experience.  Camilo Bruce ‚Äì General Manager

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for 2 nights in June 2013, my house was being tented/termite.  Nice reception area, nice restaurant area, outdoor seating, nice garden.  Did not eat at restaurant so do not know about the food.  Nice clean rooms, clean hotel. price is very reasonable.  Staff was helpful.  Comfortable bed and room.  Did not use gym or any other facilities, i wish  the gym had a bike.  There are restaurants nearby.  This hotel had a homey and comfortable feel to it.  They had a television in the lobby.  The bed is comfortable and my room was comfortable. Would have liked a full length mirror in the room.  Liked that there is an alarm clock in the room; liked the fridge in the room.  Free WIFI and free parking.  Enjoyed my stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Buena Park; we are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.    While we do not offer a stationary bike in our gym, we do offer several other fitness machines to help assist our guests in keeping their workout routine during their stay.  Thank you again for choosing Marriott and we look forward to your next visit.  Camilo Bruce - General Manager

Summary Heading: Just Remodeled, small hotel, but clean and comfortable
Summary: I recently stayed at the Marriott Courtyard in Buena Park on May 31st for two nights. Most of the hotels in this immediate area are run down and or in need of an update. They have torn down many of the sleazy hotels in the area, but now those are just empty lots. If you want to be close to Knotts Berry Farm (two blocks away), Pirate Dinner Theatre and Medieval Times right across the street, this place can't be beat. The rooms were very comfortable, beds, linens, towels and new furniture.  They have a desk with a full pull out table, refrigerator, couch with fold out full bed. Flat screen TV in the 37" to 40" range. The have sliding glass doors in all rooms. The rooms that face the parking lot, only open up a foot. The rooms in the pool area all open to balconies or open patios.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to compose such an informative review of our property.  At the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Buena Park, we strive to provide a memorable and lasting experience for each guest, and it seems that you truly enjoyed your stay.  We appreciate all of your feedback and will utilize what you have given us to further improve our hotel and the overall guest experience.  Thank you again for you feedback; we look forward to seeing you soon.  Sincerely,  Camilo Bruce ‚Äì General Manager

Summary: After many trips to this area, this is my first stay at this property.  Of all the places I have stayed in the Knott's Berry Farm area, this one has impressed me the most.  As you drive in, the landscape is nicely done as is the entrance.  I was not here long enough to sample everything, but my room was well-equipped, clean and the bed was quite comfortable.  The rate was reasonable, the service was very good and access to Knott's is excellent.  I like Courtyards, and this one is no exception.  I will stay here again and would recommend this hotel for anyone looking for a comfortable stay in this area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Buena Park; we are delighted to here you had such an enjoyable stay. Thank you again for your review and we look forward to you next stay with us.    Sincerely,  Camilo Bruce ‚Äì General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for soccer and Knotts
Summary: Spent the weekend at Cerritos memorial Cup for youth soccer. This hotel couldn't be more accommodating to our families. Great pool for the kids to swim and a nice area for the adults to hang out and watch. We usually don't stay at places that don't have breakfast included but they do have a limited menu of breakfast items in the lobby. Starbucks is within walking distance. Overall a nice experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We recognize that the needs of each traveler can vary, and always strive to create an enjoyable experience for every guest.  From business travelers on the go, to families here enjoying the local attractions, the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Buena Park aims to provide a memorable trip for all that chooses to stay with us.  Thank you again for taking the time to provide us with your feedback; we look forward to being apart of your next trip.  Sincerely,  Camilo Bruce ‚Äì General Manager

Summary: We had plans to go to Knott's Berry Farm and this Marriott was close by (3 blocks away). Our room was nice, roomy, and comfortable. It's what we expect from the Courtyard line. Across the street, walking distance, is Medieval Times. Adjacent to the hotel is the wax museum. We liked our stay. If anything, I wish the room had a microwave.
Manager Response: Greetings,  Thank you for selecting the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Buena Park during your recent trip to Knott‚Äôs Berry Farm.  We know you have several choices in the Buena Park area and are delighted that you selected our hotel and had such a wonderful experience.  Thank you again for choosing Marriott and we look forward to you next stay.

Summary: This particular location is going through renovations at this time but they were excellent as far as service and the construction noise was minimal. Staff was great especilly the housekeeping staff, very friendly and efficient.
Manager Response: Greetings,  Thank you for the kind words regarding your most recent stay at the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Buena Park.  It is great to hear that you enjoyed your experience at our hotel.    As you mentioned, we are currently undergoing renovation on all of our sleeping rooms.  This enhancement is expected to be completed in May of 2013 and we hope you have the opportunity to stay with us in the future and experience our new product.  Thank you again for choosing Courtyard; we look forward to your next trip.

Summary: This is a good property, no real complaints here. The hotel when we stayed was overrun by teenagers here on what appeared to be a school band or sporting trip so there was some noise in the hallways at night.  The rooms are typical Courtyard rooms. It is laid out funky with the bed facing the window to the left when you walk in. But good stay. Also note there are NO vending machines, appears Courtyard removed them to force you to purchase any drinks or items at their front desk shop, which is about 4x time more expensive than anywhere else. Just a warning.

Summary Heading: Close to Attractions - Good Service - Good Food
Summary: Close to Knott's Berry Farm and Disneyland.  I grew up here and came back down to move our daughter into her new home.  In spite of being in the summer, the rooms were quiet, and there was room for our truck and trailer in the parking lot.  The beds were comfortable.  Had dinner in the Restaurant, the selections were varied, and the food was very tasty.  We had a great server and enjoyed our experience.  Will stay here again when we come back to this are.

It's hard to go too far wrong with a Courtyard by Marriott, and I have no regrets staying at this one.  Having said that, it's one of the more threadbare Courtyards I've stayed at.  The couch  looked like it had seen better days, and the place may be due for some fresh carpet and paint before too long.  The room was spacious and pleasant, however.  The bed was comfy, and the pillows were nice.  Minor quibble: the jacuzzi should have been hotter.  Overall, if Tripadvisor would let me give half stars, I'd give it 3-1/2.

I am a marriott rewards member . This is by far the worst Courtyard i have stayed at. The rooms are so dated and not very comfortable as far as the bedding goes. There was a bunch of teenagers staying there - and it was horribly noisy. We were near the pool and i was glad to get out of there. I will never stay here again. There are better Marriotts out there.   The only advantage is the distance to the attractions - But a decent restaurant is atleast a 15 minute drive away.

We had a great experience at the Courtyard Hotel. The location was 10 minute walk to Knott's Berry Farm Amusement Park. The Mall of Buena Park is only a 15 minute walk away. The hotel is right off of the interstate highway. We enjoyed the hot tub. The room was large and very clean and comfortable. We chose a room in the back for peace and quiet. There was no noise bothering us. There is a small restaurant in the lobby that serves breakfast, lunch & dinner. We didn't eat there because we were visiting our son & ate at his house.      I reserved the room on line and paid with my credit card in advance to get a price of $100 per night for 4 nights including taxes. I thought that was a far price.       The only negative comment I have is that the bed could have been a bit more

Summary Heading: Can't go wrong with a Marriott!
Summary: I am writing this from my room right now- I love this hotel! We checked in here at midnight last night after being scared away from the Portola Inn and Suites around the corner. The rooms are clean and spacious- we have a king bed with a couch and for only $99 a night. I love the Bistro and having Starbucks coffee is always a plus. We do not normally stay in Buena Park but if we do again I will definitely return!

Summary Heading: Depends On the Price You Pay
Summary: We used the bid feature of Priceline and got a room for $80. For that price this is a very good hotel. Our room, had a wonderful king bed with pillows as nice as our own, a sofa, balcony, refrigerator, a a large flat screen T.V. The pool was large enough for swimming laps and we enjoyed the indoor jacuzzi after our swim. Best of all was the lobby and what they call the Bistro. In the Bistro you could order snacks as well as light meals and drinks. There were T.V.s located throughout the Bistro where you could relax with a drink and enjoy your favorite program. I found the Bistro area a pleasant place to work rather than be in my room.  Medieval Knights is across the street from the hotel. We loved being able to walk over to the venue, enjoy the fabulous production, and walk back

My family and I stayed 1 night here so we could be close to Knott's. We requested a connecting room but since we checked in shortly after 3pm, we didn't get the request and our rooms were on opposite sides of the hotel. I also asked for a roll-away bed since a double bed was too small for 2 adults but they didn't have any. My bad for not looking into this earlier. Later found out that one of the rooms had a large chair that pulled out into a single bed. It would have been nice if the staff had informed us of this. The room was very warm and we had to crank the A/C down to 65 to get it cooled down. The unit was very loud when on. The room was clean and beds comfortable. We had a patio facing the courtyard which was nice. The location was also great as we walked to Knott's within

Located very near Knott's Berry Farm, this Marriott is a typical one in terms of cleanliness, comfort, and quiet.  My husband and I stayed there two nights, and were very pleased with it.  It was very hot in Southern California while we were there, so had to keep the a/c on all day and night (which rattled a bit), but it was better than cooking in our room!

Im writing this in our room right now. Better than i expected. It's okay..not good as other courtyards that we've stayed.   Bed is superrr comfortable as well as the pillow..this is so important after a loooonng drive..chose feather pillows..ur like gonna die coz its so coomfy..lol..  Rooms are clean..the only thing i dislike is the smell when u first come in..its kinda idk..oh well, we have freshener and wipes..we always brings it..so yeeaaahh!!  Just see the pictures that ive attached..were staying here for the weekend from sept 14-17..

Summary Heading: Nice hotel near Knott's Berry Farm
Summary: Had a recent 2 night stay.  The location is very convenient and easy to find, on Beach Blvd just south of the 91 freeway.  It's about a 10-15 minutes walk to Knott's Berry Farm from the hotel.  Check-in was quick and friendly.  The lobby has undergone the standard Courtyard remodel and looked nice and new.  We did not try the food at the bar.  There were several computer terminals in the lobby but the internet access was very slow and I couldn't print out my boarding pass despite multiple attempts at different times; not sure if due to the slow connection or a glitch.  Our room was spacious enough, bright, and clean.  The bed was very comfortable and the furnishings in good condition.  Mini fridge was great for storing drinks and food/snacks.  Nice flat screen TV and plenty of

It's a Marriott Courtyard, and that's what you get.  it was clean, comfortable, met all my Marriott expectations, but it was the kind and helpful staff that really made it a really nice place to stay.  I was with my mother, who is in her eighties, and the staff were just great about calling a taxi, giving suggestions, even giving us a complementary cold bottle of water as we returned from our walk to Knott's Berry Farm.

We stayed there over the weekend and covered Disney and sea world, nice location with all amenities required. Rooms were accessible, spacious and lobby area was nice.  Best part was location that is walking distance from the park and shopping district. Also some Resturants are near by. Staff was very helpful and desk facilities were nice esp the Internet and printing options. Pool was small but nice!! It is good recommendation if you are with kids or couples. Parking facility was also good and direct access from multiple directions was present. The only week point observed was the lack of tourism information available at desk. Also, only one bus AHT stops here for Disney every one hour, it may be better to check for details on Internet otherwise. Disneypark is not far away and

The most comfortable hotel bed I've had in years! (I like it soft) Asked for, and got, a quiet room. Christina at the desk was very welcoming, helpful. The AAA rate without breakfast for this night was $104 (with bkft was higher), not a bad price for summer near Knott's in Buena Park. A la carte breakfast in the lobby was expensive, so we walked next door to Burger King. Brought breakfast back to the lobby, for free coffee there. One odd thing: in our room, the plumbing to the shower was hooked up backwards (hot to cold) so that when we turned on the shower it went from very hot to very warm, not cold to warm. Turned it all the way up for an OK shower.

My bf and I love this property for the cleanliness and great location. The staff has always been exceptional and no matter what room we have been given its always been a great experience,never have we had any problems.  My favorite thing about this hotel though is the inside jacuzzi, It feels private and big enough to share with other people without the awkwardness. I love bring in this hotels jacuzzi during the rainy time with my love it feels so romantic since the jacuzzi has a glass area looking outward.   Any who great hotel, mini fridge, great housekeeping and customer services... I will happily continue my business here.

This is a trip to Disney, universal studio and sea world san diego with family.   I wasn't a Marriott member when I booked this hotel and I made the booking just 3 hours prior the check in through Marriott's website, I got the lowest price $99/n for weekend and $129/n for weekdays, which was the first thing made me happy.   After a long driving from canada, I finally checked in at the midnight, front desk was friendly, helpful, efficiently, he gave me the card keys ASAP which I was so much appreciated. This was the 2nd thing made me happy.   We stayed at room 263, it was clean, well maintained, above average level room, everything in the room works well, family felt happy, I felt happy.   As trip plan was kept changing, we extended two times of our stay, we totally spent here

A friend and I stayed 2 nights at this hotel recently and had nothing but problems. After a long drive from Vegas to Cali, the last thing I wanted to deal with was issues with my hotel. My first issue began at check in when I wanted to pay cash for my room but they told me it HAD to be held against my credit card along with ridiculous damage fees IN CASE we damage the room. Ive never had this problem at any hotel Ive stayed at, nor THIS one which I had previously stayed at 3 times before. Also, the hotel didn't want to honor my military/US govt rate from my reservation. I finally get checked into my room, which is SUPPOSED to be non smoking but smelled of smoke.
